HomePage.about: We don’t touch WordPress, Wix, or builder plugins. Every project is hand-coded using modern frameworks, to help your business scale with speed and confidence.
HomePage.techSectionSubtitle: We hand-pick every tool to push your business forward. Because exceptional clients deserve exceptional solutions.

ServicesSection.heading: We Build Solutions That Power Your Business Forward
ServicesSection.subheading: Our services help you win trust, save time and grow without the headaches of generic tools.
ServicesSection.webDevelopment: Your website is your front door. If it is slow, hard to use or looks dated, visitors will click away and assume your product or service is the same. We craft responsive, on-brand sites that load fast, work on every device and turn visitors into customers.
ServicesSection.applicationDevelopment: Need a customer portal, booking system or mobile app? Poorly built software frustrates users with confusing flows and slow features. We design intuitive applications that fit your exact needs, keep data secure and make every interaction a pleasure.
ServicesSection.aiIntegration: AI can automate tasks, surface insights and delight your users when done right. Out-of-the-box tools often miss context and create more work. We integrate and train AI such as ChatGPT or custom models into your workflows so you save hours every week.
ServicesSection.customContentManagement: Generic CMS platforms force you into templates and plugins that do not fit. Updating your own site becomes a chore. We build simple, tailored admin panels so you can add pages, images or products in seconds without extra training.

pageIntro.title: Who we are — and why we started this studio
pageIntro.subtitle: Clear processes. Real results.
pageIntro.description: We’re a team of experienced software developers from Bosnia and Herzegovina. After years of building digital products, we saw a growing gap: technology is moving fast, but many businesses, especially locally, are stuck using outdated tools like WordPress, Wix, or legacy systems. Spark Studio was born to fix that. We help businesses move away from slow, bloated websites and bring them into a world of performance, scalability, and full control.

discover.title: What we do
description: We design and develop fully custom digital products—from websites and internal tools to complex web and mobile apps. Everything we build is tailored to your business goals, not just copied from a template.
We also create headless CMS solutions and custom admin panels, giving you full control over your content without the clutter and limits of platforms like WordPress.
Where it makes sense, we integrate AI and automation to eliminate repetitive tasks, speed up workflows, or deliver smart features. You get solutions that are fast, reliable, and built to scale.

build.title: How we work
description: Every project we build is fully custom—from design system to codebase. We don’t use templates, page builders, or platforms that limit your growth. What you get is clean, scalable code that belongs to you.

We prioritize performance and long-term maintainability. That means fast loading times, high Lighthouse scores, and no hidden tech debt that breaks later. Whether it’s a website, app, or dashboard, we build it to last.

You’ll always know what’s happening. We work in the open: wireframes, code reviews, progress updates, and handoff docs are all part of our process. We don’t hide behind buzzwords—we show you what’s being done, and why.

deliver.title: What we don’t do (and why)
description: We don’t build with WordPress, Wix, or other site builders. They’re bloated, slow, and filled with plugins you don’t need. They hurt performance, limit your options, and create security risks.
We don’t use AI tools to generate entire websites or apps. These tools might seem fast, but they miss context, break easily, and leave you with something generic and unmaintainable.
And we never lock you into our stack. You own your code, your content, and your future. Everything we build is yours—from day one.

items.title: No page builders
items.description: They’re slow, bloated, and impossible to scale cleanly.

items.title: No low-effort AI clones
items.description: AI tools can help—but they can’t build quality on autopilot.

items.title: No lock-in
items.description: You own everything we build. If we integrate third-party tools (like AI APIs), you stay in control and pay them directly.

values.title: The principles we work by — simple, clear, and built into everything we deliver.
values.description: Our values aren't slogans. They shape how we build, communicate, and solve problems. These principles help us stay sharp, deliver real results, and build long-term trust with every client.

items.title: Precision
items.description: We sweat the details — because sloppy code or rushed design costs more later. Everything we build is made to hold up long-term.

items.title: Efficiency
items.description: No bloated meetings or vague timelines. We plan clearly, work fast, and ship without wasting your time.

items.title: Flexibility
items.description: Your business isn’t a template — so we don’t treat it like one. We adapt our process to fit your goals, not the other way around.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: No black boxes. You see how things are built, what they cost, and why decisions are made—start to finish.

items.title: Long-Term Thinking
items.description: We don't just deliver and disappear. We’re here to support your product and team as things evolve.

items.title: Curiosity
items.description: We keep learning so your project stays current. New tools, smarter workflows, better results — that’s the goal.

pageIntro.title: Let’s work together
pageIntro.description: We can’t wait to hear from you.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Agreement
PrivacyPage.intro: Welcome to Spark Studio. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you interact with our website. By using our website, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

information_we_collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
information_we_collect.description: We do not store user data. However, we collect and process certain information via third-party services:
points: Contact Form: When you submit a message via our contact form, your message is sent to us via email through Resend.
Newsletter Subscription: When you subscribe to our newsletter, your email is processed by Resend to deliver our updates.
Cookies: Our website only stores a functional locale cookie to remember your language preference. We do not use tracking cookies or analytics.

how_we_use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
points: Responding to inquiries sent via the contact form.
Sending newsletters to users who opt-in (users can unsubscribe at any time).
Providing a localized experience through a language selection cookie.

data_sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing & Third-Party Services
data_sharing.description: We do not sell or share your data with third parties. However, we rely on Resend for email processing. Emails submitted through our forms are transmitted securely via Resend.

data_security.title: 4. Data Security
points: Our website is built with Filament CMS (hosted on Hetzner) and Next.js (hosted on Vercel), both of which follow modern security standards.
We use HTTPS to encrypt data transmissions.
Since we do not store user data, we minimize security risks associated with personal data storage.

user_rights.title: 5. User Rights & Opt-Out
points: Newsletter Unsubscription: If you have subscribed to our newsletter, you can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in the email.
Cookies: We only store a locale cookie for language selection, which does not involve tracking. No additional cookie settings are required.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated Effective Date.

contact.title: 7. Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: info@spark-dev-studio.com or directly through our Contact Form.
